record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2, S. 5, S. 113

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, it is my understanding that there are three bills at the desk that are now due for a second reading.

record.chair: The Senator is correct. The clerk will read the titles of the bills for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills, en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
